query: My order was supposed to arrive 4 days ago with standard shipping but it is still not here. What can you do?
reply:
I am sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet. Since the delivery date has passed by 4 days, this is considered a delayed order according to our policy.

Here is what we can do:

1.  We will verify the tracking information with the carrier immediately.
2.  We will provide you with an updated delivery estimate where possible.

Additionally, as a goodwill gesture for the inconvenience, we may be able to offer you a discount on a future order or free express shipping on your next order.

contexts.text:
- An order can only be modified or cancelled **before it is shipped**.
- Once the order status is “Shipped” or “Completed”, we can no longer:
  - Change the shipping address
  - Change items or quantities
  - Cancel the order
- If the customer wants to change or cancel an order:
  - They should contact support as soon as possible with:
    - Order number
    - Requested change

> If an order has already shipped, the customer may need to follow the **Returns and Refunds** process instead.

---

## 7. Delayed Orders

An order is considered **delayed** if:

- It has not arrived **3 days after the maximum estimated delivery date** for the chosen shipping method, **and**
- The tracking information is not updating or shows an unexplained delay.

In case of a confirmed delay:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

contexts.text:
- Support should:
  - Verify tracking information with the carrier.
  - Provide the customer with an updated delivery estimate where possible.
- As a goodwill gesture (if allowed by policy), we may:
  - Offer a **discount on a future order**, or
  - Offer **free express shipping on the customer’s next order**.

---

## 8. Lost or Missing Packages

A package may be considered lost if:

- Tracking shows “delivered” but the customer did not receive it, **or**
- No tracking updates for more than **7 business days**.

Steps:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

contexts.text:
We currently offer the following shipping methods:

### 3.1 Standard Shipping

- Estimated delivery time: **3–5 business days** after dispatch.
- Available for most domestic addresses.
- Tracking link is provided once the order has shipped.

### 3.2 Express Shipping

- Estimated delivery time: **1–2 business days** after dispatch.
- Higher shipping fee than standard.
- Recommended for urgent orders.

### 3.3 International Shipping (If Available)

- Estimated delivery time: **7–14 business days**, depending on destination.
- Customs or import duties may apply and are the responsibility of the customer.
- Some products may not be eligible for international delivery due to restrictions.

---

## 4. Shipping Fees

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

query: I bought shoes 20 days ago, unused and in original packaging. Can I still return them and get a full refund?
reply:
Yes, absolutely! Since it has only been 20 days, you are well within the **30-day return window** for delivery.

As long as the shoes are unused and in their original packaging, they are considered in resellable condition, and you should receive a full refund upon inspection.

contexts.text:
# Returns and Refunds

This article describes our return, exchange, and refund policies.

---

## 1. General Return Policy

- Customers can request a return within **30 days** of the delivery date.
- Items must generally be:
  - Unused and in their original condition.
  - In original packaging with all tags, labels, and accessories included.
- Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is required.

---

## 2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items are usually **not eligible** for return (unless they are defective or damaged on arrival):

- Gift cards or store credit.
- Digital products or downloads.
- Personal care items that have been opened (e.g., cosmetics, hygiene products).
- Clearance or “final sale” items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase.

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\returns_and_refunds.md

contexts.text:
- If the return is due to **our error** (e.g., wrong item shipped, defective product):
  - We cover the return shipping cost.
- If the return is due to **customer preference** (e.g., changed mind, ordered wrong size):
  - The customer may be responsible for return shipping, unless stated otherwise in a promotion or policy.

Agents should clearly inform the customer who will pay for return shipping.

---

## 5. Condition of Returned Items

- Returned items are inspected upon arrival.
- If the item:
  - Is in **resellable condition** (unused, undamaged, original packaging):
    - A full refund is generally issued.
  - Shows **signs of use or damage** not caused by shipping:
    - A partial refund or rejection of the return may apply, depending on severity.

If a return is rejected:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\returns_and_refunds.md

contexts.text:
- The customer is informed with:
  - Clear explanation of the reason.
  - Options, if any (e.g., sending the item back at customer’s cost).

---

## 6. Refund Methods and Timing

- Refunds are issued to the **original payment method** whenever possible.
- If this is not possible (e.g., expired card), store credit may be offered instead.
- Once the return is received and approved:
  - Refunds are processed within **5–10 business days**.
- It may take additional time for the customer’s bank or card issuer to post the refund.

Agents should remind customers:

> “Once we process the refund, your bank or card issuer may take additional days to display the refund on your statement.”

---

## 7. Exchanges

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\returns_and_refunds.md

query: I just got a login alert I don't recognize. How do I secure my account?
reply:
That is concerning! Since you've received a login alert you don't recognize, the first step is to **change your password immediately** to secure your account.

I can also quickly check your account to confirm if there are any recent orders or changes you didn't make.

contexts.text:
1. Advise the customer to **change their password immediately**.
2. Confirm recent orders and changes with the customer.
3. If necessary, temporarily lock the account while investigating.
4. Escalate to the security or fraud team if the issue appears serious.

---

## 7. Phishing and Scam Awareness

We will **never** ask customers to:

- Share their password via email, chat, or phone.
- Provide full credit card numbers over email or chat.

If a customer receives a suspicious email or message claiming to be from us:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\account_and_security.md

contexts.text:
Agents should reassure customers that:

> “We never see or store your full card number in plain text. All payments are handled via secure, industry-standard payment gateways.”

---

## 6. Account Security and Suspicious Activity

### 6.1 Security Recommendations for Customers

We recommend that customers:

- Choose a strong, unique password for their account.
- Do not reuse passwords from other websites.
- Do not share their login details with anyone.
- Log out after using shared or public devices.

### 6.2 Suspicious Activity

If a customer reports suspicious account activity, such as:

- Unknown orders
- Login notifications they do not recognize
- Changes to account details they did not make

Steps:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\account_and_security.md

contexts.text:
# Account and Security

This article explains how customer accounts work and how we protect their information.

---

## 1. Creating an Account

- Customers can create an account using:
  - Email address and password, or
  - Supported social login options (if available).
- To complete registration, the customer must:
  - Provide a valid email address.
  - Agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Benefits of having an account include:

- Faster checkout
- Order history and tracking
- Saved addresses and preferences

---

## 2. Logging In and Password Management

### 2.1 Logging In

- Customers log in using:
  - Their registered email address
  - Their password (or social login if enabled)

### 2.2 Forgot Password

If a customer forgets their password:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\account_and_security.md

reply: Hello! I'm happy to help you with your questions about orders, shipping, returns, refunds, or accounts. How can I assist you today?

contexts.text:
1. Advise the customer to **change their password immediately**.
2. Confirm recent orders and changes with the customer.
3. If necessary, temporarily lock the account while investigating.
4. Escalate to the security or fraud team if the issue appears serious.

---

## 7. Phishing and Scam Awareness

We will **never** ask customers to:

- Share their password via email, chat, or phone.
- Provide full credit card numbers over email or chat.

If a customer receives a suspicious email or message claiming to be from us:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\account_and_security.md

contexts.text:
- Shipping fees are calculated at checkout based on:
  - Destination
  - Chosen shipping method
  - Order weight or value (if applicable)
- Occasionally, we may offer free shipping promotions (e.g., above a certain order value).

---

## 5. Order Tracking

- Once the order is shipped, the customer receives an email with:
  - Carrier name
  - Tracking number
  - Tracking link
- Customers can also track orders via the **“My Orders”** section in their account (if logged in).

---

## 6. Changing or Cancelling an Order

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

contexts.text:
- Advise them **not to click any links** or download attachments.
- Ask them to:
  - Check the sender’s email address.
  - Access our website directly by typing the URL instead of using suspicious links.
- They may forward the suspicious message to our official support email for review (if allowed by policy).

---

## 8. Closing or Deleting an Account

- Customers can request to **close or delete** their account by contacting support.
- After verification of identity, we:
  - Deactivate the account, and
  - Remove or anonymize personal data where legally permitted and not required to be retained.
- Some information (e.g., invoices, transaction records) may need to be kept for legal, tax, or anti-fraud reasons, even after account deletion.

Agents should clearly explain:

query: I bought shoes 20 days ago, unused and in original packaging. Can I still return them and get a full refund?

# Returns and Refunds

This article describes our return, exchange, and refund policies.

---

## 1. General Return Policy

- Customers can request a return within **30 days** of the delivery date.
- Items must generally be:
  - Unused and in their original condition.
  - In original packaging with all tags, labels, and accessories included.
- Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is required.

---

## 2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items are usually **not eligible** for return (unless they are defective or damaged on arrival):

- Gift cards or store credit.
- Digital products or downloads.
- Personal care items that have been opened (e.g., cosmetics, hygiene products).
- Clearance or “final sale” items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase.

  - We cover the return shipping cost.
- If the return is due to **customer preference** (e.g., changed mind, ordered wrong size):
  - The customer may be responsible for return shipping, unless stated otherwise in a promotion or policy.

Agents should clearly inform the customer who will pay for return shipping.

---

## 5. Condition of Returned Items

- Returned items are inspected upon arrival.
- If the item:
  - Is in **resellable condition** (unused, undamaged, original packaging):
    - A full refund is generally issued.
  - Shows **signs of use or damage** not caused by shipping:
    - A partial refund or rejection of the return may apply, depending on severity.

## 6. Refund Methods and Timing

- Refunds are issued to the **original payment method** whenever possible.
- If this is not possible (e.g., expired card), store credit may be offered instead.

query: I just got a login alert I don't recognize. How do I secure my account?
reply:
I'm happy to help you secure your account! Dealing with unfamiliar alerts can be worrying.

To secure your account quickly, please do the following:

1.  **Change your password immediately** to a strong, unique one.
2.  **Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)** in your security settings if it isn't already active.
3.  Review your account details (email and shipping addresses) to ensure no unauthorized changes were made.

If you have any trouble, please let me know!

contexts.text:
# Orders and Shipping

This article describes how orders, shipping, and delivery work in our store.

---

## 1. Placing an Order

- Customers can place orders 24/7 through our website.
- An order is confirmed only after payment is successfully authorized.
- Once an order is confirmed, a confirmation email is sent to the customer with:
  - Order number
  - Items purchased
  - Billing and shipping address
  - Estimated delivery window

---

## 2. Order Processing Time

- Orders are typically processed within **1–2 business days**.
- Orders placed on weekends or public holidays are processed on the next business day.
- During peak seasons (e.g., sales events, holidays), processing may take an extra **1–2 business days**.

---

## 3. Shipping Methods and Delivery Times

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

query: I want to return the Order

history.content: Hey i didnot Recieve my Order

I am sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet! We can certainly look into that for you.

The best first step is to check the tracking information. You should have received an email with the carrier name and tracking link once the order shipped. You can also find this information in the **“My Orders”** section of your account.

If the order has not arrived 3 days after the maximum estimated delivery date and the tracking is not updating, it is considered delayed. If this is the case, please contact a human agent with your order number for assistance.

reply:
I can certainly help you start the return process!

Here is how returns generally work based on our policy:

**Eligibility & Requirements:**

*   Returns must be requested within **30 days** of the delivery date.
*   Items must be unused, in their original condition, and in the original packaging with all tags and accessories.
*   Proof of purchase (order number) is required.

**To Initiate the Return:**

1.  Contact customer support or use the online return form (if available).
2.  Provide your order number, the specific item(s) you want to return, and the reason for the return.
3.  Wait for our team to provide return authorization and instructions.

Please note that items like opened personal care products, gift cards, or clearance items marked as "final sale" are usually not eligible for return.

contexts.text:
# Returns and Refunds

This article describes our return, exchange, and refund policies.

---

## 1. General Return Policy

- Customers can request a return within **30 days** of the delivery date.
- Items must generally be:
  - Unused and in their original condition.
  - In original packaging with all tags, labels, and accessories included.
- Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is required.

---

## 2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items are usually **not eligible** for return (unless they are defective or damaged on arrival):

- Gift cards or store credit.
- Digital products or downloads.
- Personal care items that have been opened (e.g., cosmetics, hygiene products).
- Clearance or “final sale” items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase.

---

## 3. Return Process

To initiate a return, the customer should:

1. Contact customer support or use the online return form (if available).
2. Provide:
   - Order number
   - Item(s) they want to return
   - Reason for the return
3. Wait for return authorization and instructions.

Once the return is approved:

- We provide:
  - Return instructions
  - The return address
  - A return shipping label (if applicable)

---

contexts.text:
# Returns and Refunds

This article describes our return, exchange, and refund policies.

---

## 1. General Return Policy

- Customers can request a return within **30 days** of the delivery date.
- Items must generally be:
  - Unused and in their original condition.
  - In original packaging with all tags, labels, and accessories included.
- Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is required.

---

## 2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items are usually **not eligible** for return (unless they are defective or damaged on arrival):

- Gift cards or store credit.
- Digital products or downloads.
- Personal care items that have been opened (e.g., cosmetics, hygiene products).
- Clearance or “final sale” items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase.

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\returns_and_refunds.md

contexts.text:
- Shipping fees are calculated at checkout based on:
  - Destination
  - Chosen shipping method
  - Order weight or value (if applicable)
- Occasionally, we may offer free shipping promotions (e.g., above a certain order value).

---

## 5. Order Tracking

- Once the order is shipped, the customer receives an email with:
  - Carrier name
  - Tracking number
  - Tracking link
- Customers can also track orders via the **“My Orders”** section in their account (if logged in).

---

## 6. Changing or Cancelling an Order

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

history.content: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I'm here to help you with any questions you have about your orders, shipping, returns, refunds, or account. What can I assist you with today?

reply:
I understand you are waiting for your order.

First, please keep in mind that orders are typically processed within **1–2 business days** before they are shipped. During peak seasons, this processing time might take an extra 1–2 business days [2].

Regarding delivery, an order is considered **delayed** only if:
1. It has not arrived **3 days after the maximum estimated delivery date**, *and*
2. The tracking information is not updating [1].

Could you please provide your order number so I can check the estimated delivery window and tracking status for you?

contexts.text:
- An order can only be modified or cancelled **before it is shipped**.
- Once the order status is “Shipped” or “Completed”, we can no longer:
  - Change the shipping address
  - Change items or quantities
  - Cancel the order
- If the customer wants to change or cancel an order:
  - They should contact support as soon as possible with:
    - Order number
    - Requested change

> If an order has already shipped, the customer may need to follow the **Returns and Refunds** process instead.

---

## 7. Delayed Orders

An order is considered **delayed** if:

- It has not arrived **3 days after the maximum estimated delivery date** for the chosen shipping method, **and**
- The tracking information is not updating or shows an unexplained delay.

In case of a confirmed delay:

# Orders and Shipping

This article describes how orders, shipping, and delivery work in our store.

---

## 1. Placing an Order

- Customers can place orders 24/7 through our website.
- An order is confirmed only after payment is successfully authorized.
- Once an order is confirmed, a confirmation email is sent to the customer with:
  - Order number
  - Items purchased
  - Billing and shipping address
  - Estimated delivery window

---

## 2. Order Processing Time

- Orders are typically processed within **1–2 business days**.
- Orders placed on weekends or public holidays are processed on the next business day.
- During peak seasons (e.g., sales events, holidays), processing may take an extra **1–2 business days**.

---

## 3. Shipping Methods and Delivery Times

Agents should clearly inform the customer who will pay for return shipping.

contexts.text:
# Returns and Refunds

This article describes our return, exchange, and refund policies.

---

## 1. General Return Policy

- Customers can request a return within **30 days** of the delivery date.
- Items must generally be:
  - Unused and in their original condition.
  - In original packaging with all tags, labels, and accessories included.
- Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is required.

---

## 2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items are usually **not eligible** for return (unless they are defective or damaged on arrival):

- Gift cards or store credit.
- Digital products or downloads.
- Personal care items that have been opened (e.g., cosmetics, hygiene products).
- Clearance or “final sale” items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase.

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\returns_and_refunds.md

contexts.text:
1. Ask the customer to:
   - Confirm the shipping address.
   - Check with neighbors, building reception, or family members.
2. If still not found:
   - Open an investigation with the shipping carrier.
3. Once confirmed lost:
   - We may either:
     - Resend the items at no extra cost (if stock is available), **or**
     - Provide a full refund.

---

## 9. Damaged Items on Arrival

If an item arrives damaged:

- The customer should be asked to provide:
  - Order number
  - Photos of the damaged item and packaging
- Once damage is confirmed:
  - We may offer:
    - Replacement of the item, or
    - Full or partial refund, depending on severity.

Support agents should always respond with empathy and clearly explain the next steps.

1. Ask the customer to:
   - Confirm the shipping address.
   - Check with neighbors, building reception, or family members.
2. If still not found:

   - We may either:

metadata.source: C:\Users\Huzaifa Malik\Desktop\Project\Design Studio Course\Mine\My Topics\New\AI In Customer Service\Project\backend\app\kb\orders_and_shipping.md

contexts.text:
- If the customer wants a different size, color, or variant:
  - Option 1: Standard return + new purchase
  - Option 2: Direct exchange (if supported by our systems and stock levels)
- For direct exchange:
  - We ship the replacement item once the original item is scanned by the carrier or received at our warehouse.

---

## 8. Defective, Wrong, or Incomplete Items

If the customer receives:

- A **defective item**
- The **wrong item**
- An **incomplete order** (missing items)

Steps:

1. Apologize and show empathy.
2. Ask for:
   - Order number
   - Photos of the item/packaging (for defects or wrong items)
3. Offer one of the following:
   - Replacement of affected items (at no extra cost), or
   - Full refund for missing or defective items.
